SageTVPlugin.Name: DVB-S Importer
SageTVPlugin.Description: This plugin is able to automatically import/keep up-to-date the .FRQ file for all your native DVB-S tuners.
SageTVPlugin.Author: routerunner
SageTVPlugin.ReleaseNotes: 1.0.0 - First Public Release. 1.0.1 - Fixed bug on adding channels. Added registry fix for Hauppauge WinTV NOVA-HD-S2 tuner (Windows only). 1.0.2 - Support whole KingOfSat satellite directory. Don't need to restart SageTV server. 1.0.3 - Fixed Atlantic birds issues. Support LyngSat satellite directory. 1.0.4 - Add support for unconventional LNB/FRQ file name combo. 1.0.5 - Fixed empty FRQ file exception. 1.0.6 - Add configurable support to feed and radio channels. 1.0.7 - Fixed clearing FRQ files in case of incomplete data source. 1.0.8 - Print error messages in system log. 1.0.9 - Add new satellite position. 1.1.0 - Fixed wrong DVB-S2 modulation bits. 1.1.1 - Add support to remove/keep deleted channels. Removed 'pilot:0' from FRQ files to get the right value from TS. 1.1.2 - Avoid misleading system error message when 'Discard Deleted' option set to FALSE. 1.1.3 - Fixed crash when parsing not well formed frequency tables. 1.1.4 - Fixed broken system messages. 1.1.5 - Supports HTTPS updated satellite data source web sites. 1.1.6 - Added unlimited body size support. Better looking FRQ file content. 1.1.7 - Fixed always new added lineup system messages. Even better looking FRQ file content. 1.1.8 - Fixed issue with UPDATE NOW! button in configuration settings.
